nodes.text: A Human male clone served as a shock trooper with the Coruscant Guard in the Grand Army of the Galactic Republic, during the Clone Wars against the Separatists.

During the Senate hostage crisis, this clone along with several other Coruscant Guards stormed the Chancellor's Office and secured Supreme Chancellor Palpatine from any potential threats. He then notified Senator Orn Free Taa of the successful operation.
This clone first appeared in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV series in the episode Hostage Crisis which aired on March 20, 2009.
